div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 651 Fundeni, 11 km. NE of Bucharest, Rumania, 1952 Burial: after 77 B.C. Contents: 10 AR. Pot hoard with AR fibula and rock-crystal beads Dyrrhachium: 1 dr. (Meniskos) Roman Rep.: 9 den. incl. 1 imit. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) 2 den. Mitrea, SCN 2 (1958), p. 162
